titles.title: For the relief of the peoples of Bikini, Enewetak, Rongelap, and Utrik, and of other affected citizens of the Republic of the Marshall Islands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committee.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 12/1/2010--Introduced. Provides for the relief of the peoples of Bikini, Enewetak, Rongelap, and Utrik, and of other citizens of the Republic of the Marshall Islands.
